name: Counter Terrorist Battle: IS W
description:
Counter Terrorist Battle: IS War is a challenging yet thrilling war shooting simulation game. Real war game environment, stunning graphics, smooth control and plenty of deadly weapons.
*Key features*
Action packed thrilling missions to play
Wide variety of super weapons in shooting simulation
Play as a military commando to demolish the terrorism
Stunning 3D graphics and best audio effects
Responsive and smooth controls to attack
